page.title: 05SUNDAY IN CAREW AREA,TENBY.
page.content: {A SUNDAY IN THE LIFE OF THE GRIFFITHS {FAMILY,CAREW. On Sunday my dad goes to work as a tiler at 8.30am.In the afternoon,if it is fine,he goes to watch cricket. I go to Sunday School at 11.00am and when I get home at 12.00am my lunch is waiting.It consists of lamb,potatoes, peas,carrots and cauliflower. Sunday afternoon I visit the local market and then go to the cricket. My brother does not get up until 11.00am because he is a disc jockey on Saturday nights.In the afternoon he goes jalopy racing. At nights the family stays in to watch T.V.Sometimes we go for a drive My brother goes out with his friends. On Sunday mum stays at home to cook dinner and do her books ready for work on Monday.
